meta.description: A company wants to hire new employees to minimize salary costs while meeting various constraints.

params.name: experience
params.description: Work experience of each candidate in years.

vars.name: hire
vars.description: Binary decision variable indicating whether to hire a candidate.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(salary[c] * hire[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
objective.description: Minimize the total salary paid to the hired candidates.

constraints.name: budget_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(salary[c] * hire[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
constraints.description: Total payment to selected candidates must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: at_least_one_master_or_phd
constraints.description: Select at least one candidate with a master's or PhD degree.

constraints.name: min_12_years_experience
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(experience[c] * hire[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
constraints.description: Total work experience of selected candidates must be at least 12 years.

constraints.name: at_most_one_of_A_or_E
constraints.description: Choose at most one of candidates A or E.
